channel.title: Is your school boring?!
channel.description: just a little topic, please answer to say if: [b] YOUR SCHOOL SUCKS, DIE! [/b] [b] SCHOOL IS OK BIT BORIN [/b] [b] Its good, i like it loads [/b] last one makes you a g33k <3

item.title: Is your school boring?!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I have never really gave a crap about school, but the senior years are much better. It just starts to get interesting when you reach grade 11.

Read full topic

item.title: Is your school boring?!
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“lothy, post:48, topic:51614”][quote author=apzrman link=topic=72427.msg832727#msg832727 date=1169978624]
(i’m in yr 9 this yr) i’m doing music & art as my electives
[/quote]
I remember I had to perform in either year 7 or 8 for music. -_- It was shit, and I didn’t like it.[/quote]
I love performing. Although the main reason i chose Music was because i started Piano a while ago and would like to learn some background history and information on music. Also my friend chose it, and she’s an amazing Pianist.

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:49, topic:51614”][quote author=XxKanexX link=topic=72427.msg829509#msg829509 date=1169920039]

I have trouble with school and instead go to a skill training place. I’m taking courses in web design, photography and still need to choose 3 more.

I did Photography last year as an elective and this year am moving to Film making & design… Also Music.
[/quote]

I was thinking of doing media, witch is pretty much film making & image editing. I got 3 course to choose from so I’ll see what I can get.[/quote]
I’ve only got two courses. I’m hoping it’s fun, if it’s not i’ll probably switch to Photography, again. I’ll miss taking advantage of the dark room, using the excuse that i’m developing just to miss classes.

Enjoy.

[quote=“lothy, post:46, topic:51614”]Can’t remember if I said it earlier in the topic, but I’m doing programming, IT, chem, maths, legal, religion and english. So it’s not even going to be a bad year.
And I wish I got 6 - 8 hour shifts sometimes. I get next to no work, because those nasty employers I mentioned earlier are money hungry faggots, and selling $230 an hour isn’t so easy; I’ve probably failed the quota too many times.
Wishes he had a job where you just rock up and do something that you don’t have a chance at failing at due to customers[/quote]
I’m thinking of altering my times to lower, because i have no time to do anything anymore. At the moment i’m on holidays, so it’s all good.

Read full topic

[/quote]
I did Photography last year as an elective and this year am moving to Film making & design… Also Music. :P[/quote]

I was thinking of doing media, witch is pretty much film making & image editing. I got 3 course to choose from so I’ll see what I can get.

Read full topic

item.title: Is your school boring?!
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Can’t remember if I said it earlier in the topic, but I’m doing programming, IT, chem, maths, legal, religion and english. So it’s not even going to be a bad year.
And I wish I got 6 - 8 hour shifts sometimes. I get next to no work, because those nasty employers I mentioned earlier are money hungry faggots, and selling $230 an hour isn’t so easy; I’ve probably failed the quota too many times.
Wishes he had a job where you just rock up and do something that you don’t have a chance at failing at due to customers

item.title: Is your school boring?!
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“VG_Kobra, post:39, topic:51614”][quote author=PaulT link=topic=72427.msg820480#msg820480 date=1169768867]
I go to UMass Lowell. I love it. I take exactly one class every week.
[/quote]

Lol Massachusetts huh? I guess now we all know where all that drive to make American a better place comes from

BTW have you ever met one of those so called Gay-Couples? I heard they’re a legend but I want to hear it from someone who has seen one :eek:[/quote]
Oh god, visit my school and ask for any Guy who got in for dancing.
Most of them are gay. lawl.

Read full topic

item.title: Is your school boring?!
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“lothy, post:37, topic:51614”][quote author=XxKanexX link=topic=72427.msg823942#msg823942 date=1169813558]

Are most of you guys in highschool or middle school?

Highschool. I don’t hate/dislike school, I just get tired of it…too much homework. I never get time for anything now.

Neither.

I get up at 6:50am
Leave for the bus at 8:20am
Arrive at 8:55am
Finish at 3:13pm
Arrive home from bus at around 4pm.
Then from 5 - 11pm i work and when i get home i study.

The only night of from work i ever get is Thursdays.
And i sleep about 5 hours or less a night. ;s
Life’s a bitch. </3.
[/quote]
That’s not abnormal. By the time you get a real 8 hour a day job you’ll be wishing school was that much longer. And I can say that having done 8 hour shifts for a sports store with the expectation that I sell $230 per hour - it’s tough. If you think your principal and teaches are tough, wait until you work full time under somebody.[/quote]
I do 6 hours every weekday except thursday and 8 hours on weekends and public holidays. :\

Read full topic

item.title: Is your school boring?!
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:28, topic:51614”][quote author=leader link=topic=72427.msg823918#msg823918 date=1169812555]

Are most of you guys in highschool or middle school?

Highschool. I don’t hate/dislike school, I just get tired of it…too much homework. I never get time for anything now.
[/quote]
Neither.

I get up at 6:50am
Leave for the bus at 8:20am
Arrive at 8:55am
Finish at 3:13pm
Arrive home from bus at around 4pm.
Then from 5 - 11pm i work and when i get home i study.

The only night of from work i ever get is Thursdays.
And i sleep about 5 hours or less a night. ;s
Life’s a bitch. </3.[/quote]
That’s not abnormal. By the time you get a real 8 hour a day job you’ll be wishing school was that much longer. And I can say that having done 8 hour shifts for a sports store with the expectation that I sell $230 per hour - it’s tough. If you think your principal and teaches are tough, wait until you work full time under somebody.

Read full topic

item.title: Is your school boring?!
item.dc:creator: @apzrman apzrman
item.description:
@apzrman wrote:

get up at 7:30, 8:00 fall asleep waiting for the bus, 8:10 bus comes, 9:00 school (time for more sleeping!), 3:25 wake up and realize it’s time to go home, 4:20 back home… the rest after that is a blank to me…

http://www.ratemyteachers.com/
you can say almost enything about ur teachers here (just aslong as they’re in the database)

Read full topic

avistetto:

i get up at 7.40 have a shower then leave @ 8.00 to bike with mate then get hom around 3.40 do hw till 5.40 sleep till 8.40 watch tv then sleep

My school starts at 9, finishes at half 2 and I’m home by about 3.
